headline.main: PETAIN HAILS FIGHT AGAINST THE SOVIET; Tells French Volunteers With Germans That Reich Earns 'Gratitude of World'

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 6 -- By taking the lead in "the crusade against bolshevism" Germany has "acquired rightful title to the gratitude of the world," writes Marshal Henri Philippe Petain, Chief of the French State, in a letter he has sent to Colonel Jean Labonne, commanding the Legion of French Volunteers Against Bolshevism.
abstract: Marshal Petain hails French volunteers' fight against Bolshevism, lr to French Col E Labonne, commanding French legion
